title.rendered: January 2021: Youth Action and Intergenerational Cooperation on Peace and Disarmament

content.rendered: January 2021: Youth Action and Intergenerational Cooperation on Peace and Disarmament: The practice of child soldier, a worldwide phenomenon, organized by the Basel Peace Office, Youth Fusion and the Office of Cantonal and Urban Development, Department of Presidential Affairs, Canton of Basel-Stadt, Switzerland.
